short.name: Short (5-10 minutes)
short.msg: This is a notice that the Minecraft server will be going down for server-side maintenance and updates in about 5 minutes! I'm hoping the server won't be down for super long, but will update in this channel if anything goes awry. Thank you for your patience.

long.name: Long (up to 1 hour or more)
long.msg: This is a notice that the Minecraft server will be going down for server-side maintenance **in about 1-2 hours**! It's honestly unknown how long this will take (could be 15 minutes, could be 1 hour). We will try our best to get everything back up in a reasonable time. Thank you for your patience.
